## BootComponent.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BootComponent` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(app: Application);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | <code>Application</code> | Application instance |
